Title: Only Yesterday
Writer: Hotaru Okamoto (manga), Yuuko Tone (manga), David Freedman (english adaptation), Isao Takahata (screenplay)
Actors: Miki Imai, Toshirô Yanagiba, Yoko Honna, Mayumi Izuka
Plot: A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while reminiscing about her childhood in Tokyo.
